description:
You have never looked for a job and passed any interview? You don't know how to do first steps in building your career? This course will prepare you for solving following task: how to find vacancy, how to prepare a CV, how to prepare for a job interview, how to behave during interview, how to cope with a fear and what to do on your first day of your job. All this will help you to quick start your career!


Learn to prepare for job interview, to rehearse it and to pass it successfully.


In this course, you'll learn:

  • How to define career goals
  • How to find appropriate vacancies
  • How to prepare a clear and meaningful CV which will show you in a good light
  • How to prepare for interview
  • How to rehearse for answers of main questions during interview
  • How to predict questions you might be asked during interview
  • How to act during interview
  • How to cope with fear
  • Will learn who mentor is and why you need him
  • Will learn to build your career self-consciously


This course is not only about how to make good CV or to pass difficult job interview. First of all, it's about how to believe in your potential and make the self-development a part of your life.


  • 18 video-lectures
  • BIG “DREAM JOB” TEST which will help you to work at course material
  • 3 individual worksheets
  • 2 forms for setting career goals
  • CV template
  • Action Plan form


This course is based on my 15years experience in selection, assessment and development of company's employees.
title: How To Find The Job Of Your Dreams: Students And Graduates
